name: Break the Rule - AI&Games JAM 21
description:
On the occasion of the AI JAM organized by AI and Games on the theme of artificial intelligence, the X&Immersion team tried to present in 7 days a mini-game using the ADABOT technology. A big thanks to Tommy Thompson and the organising team!

X&I Team : 

- Game developers : Arnaud Norel, Judicael Remond, Alexandre Folliot

- Sound designer & Music  composer : Benoît Vanhoffelen

Thanks to Oriane Opsomer & Béranger Godeau
